alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Lake of the Woods (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 2:42PM CDT until August 02 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Beltrami County in north central Minnesota... Southeastern Lake of the Woods County in north central Minnesota... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 241 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Oaks Corner, or 45 miles southeast of Roseau, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Oaks Corner around 250 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
